intro: Drosanthemum speciosum, commonly known as the showy drosanthemum, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Aizoaceae family, which is characterized by its succulent leaves and vibrant flowers. The plant produces small, clustered flowers in shades of red, yellow, and orange, often blooming in spring and summer. Its leaves are fleshy and succulent, adapted to store water in arid environments. It is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its striking appearance and ability to thrive in dry conditions.
